problem.markdown:
Let's access line \(M_{11}-M_2\) first. Only use integer N for input.
>>What is the optimal profit rate? Round to nearest integer<<
= 4379 +- 10
>>What is the optimal \(N\)?<<
=100+-6
[explanation] The maximum profit rate for the M11{M2 version occurs at N \(\approx\) 100. It is \(\approx\) $4,379. [explanation]
<script src="/static/st.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
